title: Cosimo Tassinari - italian sign typeface
content:
Hey everyone.

I don't think there is an exact match for this, as it is from a random italian sign maker, but does anyone have any suggestions to something close to this? Kinda has a bit of a 1930s feel.

Thanks!!!  
Josh

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-10-02 at 10.12.34 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-02%20at%2010.12.34%20PM.png) | 148.62 KB |
author: wolfattack

comments.content:
You may like one of the following:  
 **[Headline Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=BAGraphics%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=HeadlineGothic%20-%20Regular&fid=94df9f16d2c99832d0420b4c2e4fa393&fsize=60&text=COSIMO%20TASSINARI&fit=1)** by Bob Alonso [BAGraphics, 1995]  
 **[Steelfish](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Typodermic%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Steelfish%20-%20Light&fid=142ef201bd60a6759f48771d40f09eb1&fsize=60&text=COSIMO%20TASSINARI&fit=1)** by Ray Larabie [Typodermic, 2001-2011]  
 **[Flama (Light UltraCnd)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Feliciano%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Flama%20-%20Light%20UltraCnd&fid=97dad75680a6ac498d5692ef2e390bef&fsize=60&text=COSIMO%20TASSINARI&fit=1)** by Mario Feliciano [2008]  
 **[Solido Compact (UltraLight)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=DSType%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Solido%20Compact%20-%20UltraLight&fid=96dd5905d873ffc7b24919c07b91f286&fsize=60&text=COSIMO%20TASSINARI&fit=1)** by Dino dos Santos [DSType, 2012]

Some of these have an R with a curved leg, some an M with too long a center point, but some are very close:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/herald\_gothic\_light\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font_bureau/herald_gothic_light_ot/ot_ps/specimen/tester/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/font\_bureau/herald\_gothic\_light\_ot/ot\_ps/specimen/tester/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/headline-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/headline-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/headline-gothic/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/monthly-meeting/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/monthly-meeting/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/monthly-meeting/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheticals/jains/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheticals/jains/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typotheticals/jains/")  
 [http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0016](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0016 "http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T0016")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hollandfonts/pacific-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hollandfonts/pacific-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hollandfonts/pacific-sans/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419210449/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/")

Closest out of the box might be Monthly Meeting JNL, and Agency FB  
Either could be edited to match.  
Don
